title: Though Your Sins Be as Scarlet
author: F. J. Crosby

verses.text: Though your sins be as scar - let, They shall be as white as snow; as white as snow, as white as the glo - ry, They be; Though they be red like crim - son, They shall be as wool! Hear the voice that en-treats you, O re - turn ye un - to God! He'll for-give your transgressions, And re-member them no more.

He'll for-give your trans-gres-sions, And for - get your in - i - qui-ty; Your sins shall be a-way from you As far as east from west can be. Though they be as scar - let, They shall be as white as snow, He'll for-give your transgressions, And re-member them no more.

chorus.text: Though your sins be as scar - let, they shall be as white as snow; They shall be as white as snow, as white as snow; Though your sins be as scar - let, they shall be as white as snow, They shall be as white as snow.
